pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Summons a totem that damages nearby enemies with bolts of energy.$(br)$(l)Magical School:$() $(c)Fury$()$(br)$(l)Mana Cost:$() 100$(br)$(l)Cooldown:$() 120 seconds$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Tier:$() 2
